cue.label: Introduction
cue.voice: Create tasks, stories, and bugs instantly. Add descriptions, set priorities, and assign ownership in a single line.

cue.label: Filter
cue.voice: Find exactly what you need with powerful query filters. List all open issues, or filter by status, priority, or assignee.

cue.label: Hierarchy
cue.voice: Group related tasks under an Epic to track larger initiatives. Creating a child task automatically links it to the parent.

cue.label: Workflow
cue.voice: Move an issue to In Progress and assign it to yourself in one move. Keep your project moving forward without leaving the terminal.
